rules_text:
Flash
When Tenvilu, Earthen Warden enters, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]He protected a chosen group of humans from his brother's flooding...[/i]
rules_text2:
Legacy [i](You may play this side of this card only from your graveyard. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Permanents you control have lifelink and “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
flavor_text2: [i]...so that they would go on to inhabit the new world he created for them.[/i]
